The certificates have been recently updated and are valid for the upcoming months, which adds to the credibility of the website from a security standpoint. However, the presence of an SSL certificate alone is not enough to determine the legitimacy of a website. I should now check for any customer reviews or complaints about the website and analyze the payment methods used by the website.
